title: Thunderful World Indie Game Showcase Live Reactions
description:
Tim, Andy, Blessing, and Mike partnered with the super rad Thunderful Games to react to the first ever Thunderful World Showcase featuring a ton of awesome indie games!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1

Get The Shows Ad-Free On Patreon: 
Kinda Funny http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 
Kinda Funny Games http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames

Buy Some Merch: http://www.kindafunny.com/store 

Follow Us On Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids 

Follow Us On Instagram: http://instagram.com/KindaFunnyVids

Watch Us Live On Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames

Listen To Our Podcasts On Your Favorite Podcast Service:
The Kinda Funny Podcast: https://bit.ly/3wA9GVo
In Review – Movies Ranked, Reviewed, & Recapped: https://bit.ly/2VAgdT7
Kinda Funny Screencast – TV & Movie Reviews Podcast: https://bit.ly/3e7yQ75
Kinda Funny Gamescast: https://bit.ly/3wBgRwg
Kinda Funny Games Daily: https://bit.ly/2T3Y3rS
PS I Love You XOXO – A PlayStation Podcast: https://bit.ly/3r3rjvB
Kinda Funny Xcast – An Xbox Podcast: https://bit.ly/36twqvD

Follow The Kinda Funny Team On Twitter:
Greg Miller: https://twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim Gettys: https://twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick Scarpino: https://twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Andy Cortez: https://twitter.com/TheAndyCortez
Blessing Adeoye: https://twitter.com/BlessingJr
Mike Howard: https://twitter.com/SnowBikeMike
Kevin Coello: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyKevin
Joey Noelle: https://twitter.com/joeynoelle
Barrett Courtney: https://twitter.com/SadBoyBarrett
Roger Pokorny: https://twitter.com/rogformer
Greg Gettys: https://twitter.com/KindaCoolGreg
Gary Whitta: https://twitter.com/garywhitta
Parris Lilly: https://twitter.com/vicious696
Janet Garcia: https://twitter.com/Gameonysus
Tamoor Hussain: https://twitter.com/TamoorH

In Review Intro Videos by: https://twitter.com/CameronKen
In Review Intro Music by: https://twitter.com/CarterHarrell
